Package org.waarp.common.logging

Classes implementing logging facility

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WaarpLogger
    Internal-use-only logger used by Waarp.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractWaarpLogger
    A skeletal implementation of WaarpLogger.
    PrintOnlyWarningLogbackStatusListener
    You need to add the following line within the XML configuration file of Logback:
    SysErrLogger
    Utility class to be used only in classes where WaarpLogger is not allowed
    WaarpJdkLogger
    java.util.logging logger.
    WaarpJdkLoggerFactory
    Logger factory which creates a java.util.logging logger.
    WaarpLoggerFactory
    Creates an WaarpLogger or changes the default factory implementation.
    WaarpSlf4JLogger
    logger using SLF4J from LOGBACK
    WaarpSlf4JLoggerFactory
    logger factory using SLF4J from LOGBACK
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WaarpLogLevel
    The log level that WaarpLogger can log at.
